Setup the debug function

if [ -n "${DEBUG:+1}" ]; then function debug(){ local message=$1 shift for arg in "$@"; do message="$message [$arg]" done echo "DEBUG: $message" } debug "debug turned on" "$DEBUG" else function debug(){ true; } fi

Take mock args from the front for testing As soon as we meet an option we don't know, go on to doing the mock

mock_rc=0 mock_sleep=0.01 while true; do debug "args" "$1" "$@" case "$1" in "--mock-rc") shift; mock_rc=$1; shift;; "--mock-sleep") shift; mock_sleep=$1; shift;; *) break;; esac done
